A 3-year-old could connect the following dots with a fat burgundy crayon. Ryan is coached by Falcons offensive coordinator Kyle Shanahan. Shanahan is two things: Cousinss first pro offensive coordinator, back in his days with Washington, and the apparent next coach of the San Francisco 49ers. Cousins is guaranteed to play in Washington just one more season, and wouldnt Shanahan just love to take a guy with whom he already has worked to the Bay?
